title: Liberia Is Officially Declared Free Of Ebola
teaser: NPR's Arun Rath speaks with correspondent Jason Beaubien in Monrovia, Liberia's capital, about reaction to this milestone. Although Liberians are jubilant, there's still concern about the situation in Sierra Leone and Guinea.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
